name: PaCoDoku
description:
PaCoDoku is Sudoku for the rest of us.
If looking at a myriad of numbers gives you a headache and nightmares about math class in school, this app is what you're looking for if you still want to try out the famous Sudoku.
Best of all it's free, so give it a go right now!
We're depending on good feedback and ratings to be able to improve our games, so please leave a rating, and email us if you have any suggestions.
